description.p:

TTL is an all-in-one tool for downloading, managing, and launching your favorite anime games. Itâ€™s designed with flexibility, ease of use, and customization in mind. Supported games - Genshin Impact - Honkai: Star Rail - Honkai Impact 3rd - Zenless Zone Zero - Wuthering Waves - Punishing: Gray Raven
Is this safe to use? Can I get banned? We do our best to ensure the launcher avoids detection and doesn't interfere with sensitive files or anti-cheat systems. However, some games require the Launcher to disable the anti-cheat to get them running (Linux only). So use TTL at your own risk
